definition: to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 乔达虚汽车修理厂位于市郊，那里过往车辆很多。

sentences.english: Once the belief thease disappeared. i, a word denied all the past.
sentences.chinese: 曾经的信仰灰飞烟灭，一句话否定了所有的过往。

sentences.english: The owners of these experiences recognize them as fragmentary semimemories.
sentences.chinese: 这些过往经历的主人把它们当作是零碎的半记忆片段。

sentences.english: Finally, it seems, Spain is ready to confront a horrifying aspect of its recent past.
sentences.chinese: 最终，西班牙似乎已准备面对其不堪回首的过往。

sentences.english: However, as seeing the past, we should realize what we get now is not easily come by.
sentences.chinese: 回首过往，方能让人了解到眼前的得来不易。

sentences.english: He also blessed us that we would be able to remember our previous lives.
sentences.chinese: 他还祝福我们能记得过往的生世。

sentences.english: The dry river- bed find no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 干涸的河床不对它的过往心存任何感激。

sentences.english: He is standing in front of the supermarket, passing out flyers to customers.
sentences.chinese: 他站在超市前面，向过往的路人发传单。

sentences.english: Lessons must remain learned from the past wars.
sentences.chinese: 必需从过往的战争中罗致履历哺育。

sentences.english: To sacrifice moments in your life now for those that are dead and gone is a wasteful endeavor.
sentences.chinese: 为了已经逝去的过往牺牲生命中当下的时间是徒劳的。

sentences.english: We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是过往的产物，却不一定要成为过往的囚徒。

sentences.english: We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是过往的产物，却不一定要成为过往的囚徒。

sentences.english: I still locked cannot go back of the past.
sentences.chinese: 我终究还是被锁在了回不去的过往。

sentences.english: Don't read the past, not for the future, cherish now.
sentences.chinese: 不念过往，不为未来，珍惜现在。

sentences.english: Someone claimed that they got along well in Iraqi war in the past.
sentences.chinese: 有人声称他们俩在伊拉克战争期间过往甚密。

sentences.english: The dry river-my bed finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯槁的河床，实在不感谢它的过往。

definition: to turn around/to look back/to recollect
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
